content: and then along the back of the body and head and stuff secure eyes by adding either buttons or toy safety eyes embroider some stitches for the smile and body markings or embroider some love hearts © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls arms make two using your chosen colour cast on 12 sts row 1-6 st st 6 row row 7 kfb k1 6 times 18 sts row 8-10 st st 3 row row 11 k2tog 9 times 9 sts break yarn and thread through rem sts pull tight and fasten using mattress sts sew along the side seam up to and stuff the lower part of the arm attach to either side of the body thank you for downloading my pattern i hope you will enjoy knitting your very own halloweenies © copyright 2021 cilla webb - cilla s purls
